description:
Like explain in this question:
https://answers.launchpad.net/nova/+question/177546
the multi scheduler cannot switch requests (select for example) to the distributed scheduler.
title: DistributedScheduler via the MultiScheduler fails

comments.content:
Like explain in this question:
https://answers.launchpad.net/nova/+question/177546
the multi scheduler can switch requests (select for example) to the distributed scheduler.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ethuleau

comments.content: Looks like the distributed scheduler was deprecated for the Essex release.  I'm not sure if this is still an issue.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mattstep

comments.content:
The distributed scheduler was renamed to be the filter scheduler in:

    a81130b1a95ab89cf253c429cb4f0a00f1afb83d

Also, the current default configuration is to use the multi scheduler, with the filter scheduler behind that, so I know it's working fine now.

Thanks for the report!
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb
